stepTasks.comment: Kill the nightsabers first
Sell junk. Buy 3 stacks of arrows
Start casting hearthstone as soon as you start talking with him.
Sell junk. Need 3s 70c for white bow + serpent sting
Up the ramp. Learn serpent sting
Fall through the holes in the ramp
After getting the items from the spiders die to death warp to the starting area
Sell junk
After getting the egg die to death warp
Fill the fial at the well
If enough mobs are alive pull a bunch to death warp. Otherwise, walk it out running around the tree from the lakes' side.
Learn Arcane shot if level 6
Sell junk. Buy 2 stacks of arrows
Save Small Spider Leg x7 and Small Egg x9 for a quest/cooking while doing Zenn's quest.
If the patrol happens to be nearby when you get to town accept their quest.
Upstairs, upper floor. Don't learn first aids yet.
Jump down. Pull and kill the nearby owl. Sell junk while you are at it.
>>>SET HEARTHSTONE<<<
If you didn't reach level 6 in Shadowgleen talk to the trainer afterwards to learn Arcane shot
Learn cooking. Need spider legs x7 and eggs x9
Learn herbalism here. Track herbs can be used to track some quest items.
Kill the owl behind the house and some nightsabers while running towards the lake.
Wait out the roleplay when turning the quest
All around the lake. Preferably the southern side of it. If dynamic spawns are on you won't have to go too far away.
Climb up from here to get out of the lake
Kill owls and spiders on the way for the satyr quest
Look around to see if the rare is around, he paths into the house
Click the furniture inside the house
You can cheese the mobs by jumping up and down the ledges of the house
Fill the phial at the moonwell
Cats southwest of the moonwell. If missing lots of owls there are some extra on the road to Shadowgleen. Try to finish cooking quest
Learn First Aid
Repair/Buy arrows if needed at the inn and train level 8 skills if at that level
Need to save some items to reach Cooking 15 for a quest in Darkshore. 14 small eggs, can be adquired in Darkshore later too.
The are 3 Fel Cones here
The chest in this camp is not worth going for if the respawns are fast

subTasks.comment: The gem is inside the container that Ferocitas drops

stepTasks.comment: Die around this place to deathwarp to Dolanaar
Look for the Satyr boss inside the cave. Path towards the lower level where the pond is. If he is in 1 of the 2 balconies, go through the first corridor the went north at the entrance of the cave.
Look for the patrol and accept their quest if you haven't yet
The are exactly 4 shamans between the 2 camps
Kill anything on your way pathing around the southern side of the mountain. Avoid the rare Owl if it's around. Interact with the tree to get the quest.
Fill the phial at the moonwell
After looting the herbs, go further north to check if the rare spider is alive. If it's there you can't kill it.
Grind furbolgs untill you are 4420XP away from level 10. If you are >5020XP away, grind until you are 5270XP away then.
Die while near the mountains to death warp to Darnassus
Learn staves for 9s

subTasks.comment: HS back to Dolanaar

stepTasks.comment: Purify the demon essence in the moonwell
Only do this if you grinded to 5270XP instead of 4420XP because you were too short on XP
Train level 10 skills
Tame a spider

subTasks.comment: If you cant abandon the spider after taming it, log out inside the inn even of you are in combat. Same thing for the 2 following quests

stepTasks.comment: Tame a cat
Tame an owl

subTasks.comment: Consider deathwarping in the neares furbolg camp, it also may have a chest

stepTasks.comment: You can buy level 10 arrows now, a quiver with some extra slots and the level 11 bow if you have spare money. Fill the quiver and buy the bow later if you still don't have the money.
Tame an Owl near Dolanaar

subTasks.comment: Keep your pet alive!!!! You can use it and it wont run away, but if it dies you can't rez it until getting to Darnassus, making the next quests much more harder.

stepTasks.comment: Ride the cart if it's nearby. Check/bind your keybind to get out of a vehicle or type /leavevehicle once you arrive to the spot close to the pass through the mountains.
Go into the mountains and try to /target Corrupted Treant. Kill it if it's inside the cave and then drop down.
Type /target Lord to check if the rare spider is around. If so kill it
Kill the tramplers for the tumors while running down the river

subTasks.comment: Check if Blackmoss is around and kill it if so (kite backwards and keep agro). Don't need to accept the quest yet if you kill it.

stepTasks.comment: If the spider is not there check [41,25] afterwards
Check for the Corrupted Treant here if you didn't kill it before
Don't bother with the chests around here and be careful about the Matriarch, they hit like a truck and heal.
Fill the vial in the moonwell

subTasks.goalName: Lead Mist to the Sentinel near the moonwell

stepTasks.comment: There is a roaming rare here (white harpy), keep an eye out.
Die near the mountains to deathwarp to Darnassus

subTasks.comment: Being able to accept this quest is a bug

stepTasks.comment: Drop down into the temple's moonwell

subTasks.goalName: Offer the sacrifice at the fountain

stepTasks.comment: Buy a stack of meat for your owl and feed it
Ride the cart to Dolanaar if it is around.
Buy the level 11 bow if you couldn't before and restock arrows

subTasks.comment: Only if it was bugged and you could accept it
Only if you hand't before because you were short on XP for level 10

stepTasks.comment: Buy level 12 spells if you leveled up. Check if the cart is around to ride it to Darnassus. Otherwise, do some cardio.
Fly to Darkshore
>>> Set Hearthstone <<
Run through the slope beside the road and then to the beach
Interact with the sea creature
Trap the rabid bear
Explore the furbolg camp
Kill crabs for the box's quest
Interact with the box
Run through the docks and then jump down. Track beasts on
Interact with the turtle's skull
You can buy rep items off her after you get some rep. You should be exalted after comming back here from Ashenvale
Buy 6 slot bags for every bag slot you are missing. Fill quiver with arrows and some extra just in case.
Jump off the house to the shore in front
Grind while on the way, prio Striders

Clear the grells to the south. When you are done pull the satyr thats close to the quest giver in the north side of the ruins. Turn in and accept the quests and then finish it off to instantly finish it.
Grind south to the crystal. Get as many strider meat as you can.
Move here and kill both types of moonkins. There are 2 young ones here and you can finish them in the cave north, which has 5
Save enough small eggs to get to 10 and/or 15 cooking (9 and 14 eggs respectively)!!!!!
Sell junk at the vendor inside the inn
>>> Fill the water tube <<<
Go here first to kill the first Oracle there are only 3, and you need all of them for the quest. The others are on caves to the south past the crystal
Grind south to the sentinel. Don't worry much about strider meat.
Burn the seal

subTasks.goalName: Destroy the seal at the ancient flame

stepTasks.comment: Interact with the tablet
Interact with the other tablet
Use any temporary consumable buff or guardian thaat you have. You are grinding these for a while
You have a vendor at [36,56]. Also, there is a rare for some easy silver at [35,55]
Grind the furbolgs until you are level 15 and a half (around 4 full clears). Sell junk aafter every round at the vendor and kill bears + striders if you need to wait out respawns.
You NEED to do this for 2 reasons. 1 is to make sure you reach Ashenvale at level 20. The other is that you are short on linen to level first aids.
While going south make sure you have at least 5 strider meat and finish killing the rabid bears
Hearth back to Auberdine. Make sure you have 5 strider meat!!!
Once you get to Auberdine check for the boat to Menethil. If its already there or leaving go to Darnassus instead (check some steps ahead for what to do). Otherwise, run to the docks.
While you wait for the boat work on leveling first aid until linen bandage turns yellow
Once on the boat, but x10 or x15 mild spices (enough to cook the eggs) from the gnome inside the boat.
You are on a timer once you get to menethil, buy the bow, cook the eggs and get first aids to level 50.

subTasks.comment: Buy the green bow, better quiver if you haven't yet and fill it with arrows BUT DON'T SORT THE INVENTORY HERE, KEEP MOVING

stepTasks.comment: Cook the eggs here andthen head upstairs
Begin crafting the bandages before talking to the gnome

subTasks.comment: Learn heavy linen bandage, train to first aids 50, learn the next FA rank and head back to the docks

stepTasks.comment: Grab the FP on your way out of the inn
You should have had enough time. Keep leveling first aid with all the linen you have while traveling back to Darkshore
Jump off the boat early, when you are near where the dwarf is.
Grab the FP to Darnassus, DON'T TURN IN ANY QUESTS YET
Train spells. IGNORE any quest turn in for now
If you somehow managed to reach FA level 80, train wool bandages

If you don't want to level up with warmode, skip this (this guide might not be 100% accurate w/o the XP boost). Go talk to the Warmode NPC and turn it on. This is the reason you were ignoring the quest turn ins.
Grab the FP back to Darkshore
Turn this one first. You will have to wait a bit for the RP to play out
If you are level 10 cooking and the strider meat quest isn't unlocked it means that you need level 15 cooking
Get the south-western ship lockbox first
Try to kill some Moonstalkers on the way here
Kill the crabs on your way here
Get the river sample
If you aren't done with the Moonstalkers yet, there are a bunch of them here.
If somehow not done with Moonstalkers, get them on the way here
Once you are done with the quest, suicide inside the cave and deathwarp to the GY north of Auberdine
Turn right as soon as you enter the cave and at the end of the upper floor you can get 1 yellow shroom
REFILL ARROWS
>>> Fill the bowl at the Moonwell <<<
Try to catch the cart that goes south to Ashenvale untill you arrive to Groove of the ancients. Otherwise, time for some cardio, you have rez sickness anyways
Kill Moonstalkers and bears on your way to the Murloc camp.
Once you get there, kill all the murlocs to start the event. The first wave takes a while
Keep killing bears and moonstalkers on the way to Master's glaive
There are not enough spawns of Twilight Disciples to finish the custom quest!!! You will have to wait for respawns regardless
Summon the scrying bowl
Interact with the book
>>> Wait for the disciples to spawn to finish this <<<
If you got the book that starts a quest, delete it and abandon the quest. By the time you get to IF it's worth the XP of 4 mobs. Takes longer to walk up to the guy.
Keep working on Moonstalkers. Bears should be done already
If you are very low on Moonstalker pelts you can go kill some around the lake in [42,81]
Finish Moonstalkers on the way if not done yet
There is no point in pre-clearing since you will get respawns on the way out (or worse, during the last fight)
As long as you pull the Behemoths and the dwarf is in combat the quest won't progress, so just kill everything before he reaches the end of the excavation site

The final fight happens when the dwarf gets close to the stairs on the south. To the right of those stairs 3 mobs will spawn. Kill the caster as fast as you can and keep an eye on the dwarf's health to see if he is getting attacked.
A rare crab can spawn here, decent green boots
Hearthstone back to Auberdine after getting all 4 sea creatures
Go turn the other quests while the roleplay happens
>>> Refill arrows <<< Also, check out the quartermaster for some upgrades
Grab the ingredients for the summon and kill the ENTIRE camp (good xp + cloth)
Once you are done with the first half, go to the moountain cave and kill the Den Mother
Back to the camp, keep killing things and looting ingredients
Combine the items and use them at the bonfire. Loot the talisman off the basket after killing the demon
Go around the tower on your way to the Nagas to get extra xp and cloth
The rare mage Naga can drop a blue ring
Pull a strider and a crab to the gnome if you can and accept the quest before killing them
From the crabs, the striders and the murlocs in the sunken ship to the west
Activate the robot and run back to the gnome
DON'T SELL OR DRINK THE WATERBREATHING POTIONS BY MISTAKE. You will need them for some quests down the line
Die to deathwarp to the GY north of Auberdine
You should be exalted. >>> Reefill arrows <<< and buy the blue neck off the quartermaster
Try to grab the cart again
>>> Grab the horn inside the chest <<< Use it if the druid falls asleep (bind it)
You have more than enough time to do all of this, so don't worry
Kill things ahead of him so he doesn't stop walking as much
Avoid the main road so you don't trigger the ambushes
While you are in Ashenvale, try to save up to 10 Lean Wolf Flanks and 6 Gooey Spider Legs
Kill any of the mobs here and then some, 100% drop rate. Cultists WILL kill you fast
Turn on Herb tracking, it will show you where plant bundles are
There are not enough thugs in the area to complete the quest (only 6/10). Kill the ones near the tent (4) to make them respawn first
Will need to wait out the tower of Althalaxx roleplay
First go here, then to the hidden hunter trainer
Learn spells and sell junk
If you find the rare spider on your way to Atranaar, don't bother. 3 minute fight with the potential to kill you for 27s (helmet is good for warriors and pallies tho)
>>> Refill arrows <<<
Some roleplay will play out. Keep turning the rest of the quests. You will accept the follow up later
>>> Set Hearthstone <<<
Fly to Auberdine
Try to grab the cart to Ameth'Aran or walk down there
While you wait between waves use all the linen you have. You should be 80 First aids at least by now.
Hearthstone back to Ashenvale
First go here
Run up to the lake from here afterwards
The rare elemental is not worth killing if the devs haven't added a 100% chance drop for greens on regular rares. They drop nothing most of the time otherwise.
Kite him to the mountains to the south
After killing the furbolg go through the mountains to this spot. Jump down to the tree trunk to not die from the fall
Let the roleplay play out, we will get the quest later
Go to the demons area killing some wolves and spiders on the way
Split pull the two hounds and then trap the succubus (hits like a truck). Kill the orc before the CC expires
Back to the hidden hunter trainer to sell junk
Here afterwards and drop down to the lake
Kill any of the murlocs around to get the gem while you go to the beach to the west
Kill the Nagas for the heads while you are questing around here
There is a rare Naga that can (should, it was bugged) the follow up quest item, try to kill here after turning in the first part
Talk to the elf to start the event
The turn in NPC will take a while to respawn. Go do the rest of the quests in the meantime
Heads drop from any Naga
Ugly ass chest piece, it is what it is...
Slow heavy hitting staff!!!
You can delete the journal after this
Fill the phial here
You have a hunter trainer here, can buy ammo and the alchemy supplies guy sells pots
Finish the Den watchers and Ursa in the camp to the west. You will have to go east for the others. The amulets are dropped from any furbolg
Don't use a water breathing potion for this. You can pull with your pet easy enough. Also, don't bother with the rare elemental. Too high level
Need 5 intact elemental bracers from the elementals
To Stonetalon. >>> Refill arrows <<< At the lodge first
Kill any wyvern and humanoid on your way there. Don't bother with the spiders at the start, they will root you.
>>> Light up the torch <<<
First go here and kil the operators for the plans
Now go to the lumbermill, there are a bunch of supplies around here.
The spullies are the boxes scattered around the area. If you need to sell, there is a hidden vendor at [66,60]
The follow up quest is not worth it
You can finish pridewings on your way down
While killing these, check [48,47] and [54,36] (in the mountains) for Pridewing Patriarch, can drop a +5 agi cloack
Don't kill the antlers on your way up, you need them for a quest soon
Get the FP
She also sells potions. If you need arrows there is a vendor here. DON'T SET HEARTHSTONE
A couple of antlers here. Then back to the lake
Start the elementals' quests here. Circle the lake to your left (if facing south, clockwise on the minimap)
Finish pridewings if need be
On your way down avoid the fire elementals. Kill the harpies and the basilisks. There are not enough ambushers in the zone
You can dodge the basilisks' sleep by running away from melee range (your pet too).
The rares around here are tough and drop nothing mostly. The only one that's worth it is the custom elemental. Some chests laying around
The next step lists all the objectives here
When done go to Desolace to say hello to Rexxar and grab the FP
Grab the FP

subTasks.comment: Fly to stone talon peak

stepTasks.comment: Turn this one first to avoid her becoming a frog before turning in everything
Make sure you have turned everything in and HS back to Astranaar
Forget about the quests not listed here, we are (almost) done with Ashenvale forever, the second half is garbage compared to new Hillsbrad, sadly :(
Talk to the NPC to start the event
Fly to Darnassus
Train spells
Train wool bandages  to craft them while on the boat to Menethil
Fly to Darkshore
Grab the boat to menethil and craft bandages while waiting/on it
Jump early on the boat towards this guy
Talk to the alchemy supplies guy and check for pots
>>> SET HEARTHSTONE <<< and buy a flagon of mead
Train heavy woolen bandages if first aid is 115 (should be by now)
>>> Refill arrows <<< Half quiver is enough, next level you get better arrows
You can ignore the gyroscope quest, it'll be a while untill you do it
For some reason the quest ends here in this server. You will need to do a custom quest to unlock the follow up
Talk to the engi supplies guy and buy a bronze tube for the Duskwood quest

subTasks.questName: In Search of The Excavation Team

stepTasks.comment: Kill all the regular murlocs around these camps. And keep an eye out for young crocolisks
Go here for the murloc's head
Go here and clear the crocolisks pathing towards Menethil. You can get unlucky with this one
If you dont get enough, don't worry you can finish it later. Get on the ferry as soon as you see it
Take the ferry to hillsbrad. Craft bandages while waiting/on the boat
About the Hillsbrad event. It's worth it. A lot. Espcially if you are the first one to get there since sudden death means that you get to finish the event as soon as you cap.
If you are defending, you get credit for the quest as long as you step once inside the cap range.
>>> SET HEARTHSTONE <<<
Might sell some pots too
Get the FP
Go towards the tower. Specially if sudden death. Kill the lions and the bears on the way
If you have to cap the tower, simply kill the quest mobs around while capping it
Go towards where the spiders are and finish the lions and bears quest
When done with the spiders go to the dwarves' house
>>> Be aware <<< Check that your HS cooldown is less than 14 minutes
This quest has a 15min timer. The idea is to do quests and finish this one then HS back to Southshore to turn it in.
Talk to the farmer and click the gossip to get a 1 time use 100% speed mount.
Straight line. Avoid getting dazed
Full gas, no brakes. You have to finish 2 quests and HS back before the timer runs out
If you get VERY unlucky and don't finish the tower's quest after 1 full clear accept defeat and restart the timer quest. You don't have enough time
This part is nasty. Mobs have some levels on you. Shamans hit like trucks and the regular mobs put a -50% hit chance debuff on their target
If you have to pull to mobs very close to each other hit the regular Gnolls first. When they begin casting their blindness debuff, move away from melee range (>5 yards) and it will miss.
HS back to Southshore. If you were fast and are waiting for the HS cooldown DON'T cut it short. HS out as soon as the CD is back
Some RP... turn other quests meanwhile
If you finished Hillsbrad assault/defense turn them in
Fly back to Menethil
>>> Refill ammo <<< With lvl 25 ammo
Finish young croc skins quest on your way
Also, the goblin near him sells some pots
Go to this camp first. You have to path back to the Greenwarden regardless
Once you are done with the Gnolls there, head to the ghosts' cave.
Finish the gnolls' quest while pathing towards the greenwarden
Now go grab Loch Modan's FP since your HS is on CD and you have to go back to Menethil. This way we don't have to do all this treck again when going to IF
Grab the FP and fly to Menethil

subTasks.comment: While waiting out the RP >>> SET HEARTHSTONE <<< sell junk/organice inventory/craft bandages.

stepTasks.comment: >>> Grab the crates <<< For the next step of Defense of Southshore
Fly to southshore. DON'T set HS there, keep it in wetlands
If you were on a good pace, the next battle should be about to start and hopefully you are defending.
Gather 6 apples from the fields
Turn on track hidden and kill the scouts while running north
Go here and interact with the press 6 times. Then store the cider in the barrels nearby.
Talk with the crier and start the event
Pulls the ones on the far right/left and then kill the general when he is alone
Now if the stars aligned (or you were the only person in hillsbrad...) there should be around 15min left on the battle for hillsbrad event.
Don't turn in anything yet. We want to turn in when the event is over to possibly get the bonus XP.

Wether you are defending or attacking, if you participate a single second on capturing the node you will get credit for the quests as long as your faction wins. Pass through here and then run to Durnholde
Turn on your disguise. As long as you have it the NPCs won't attack you. Ever.
Gather some armaments on the way here. The food supplies are on the first floor of the building
Finish the armaments quest
Inside the jail area run straight untill you are forced to turn either left or right. Turn left and at the end of the hallway you will find the scout
Now turn 180 and run straight to the last possible room. Jailor Eston should be walking around here
Back to the scout the same way you ran before
The scouts lags behind you a little with cheetah on. At the intersection turn right
Now get him out of the keep
Now comes the hard part. It's easy to solo this as hunter, but don't be sloopy
Go to the rooftop of the keep through the stairs of the towers in the corner of the first floor. Preferably, the nort-western one.

subTasks.comment: On your way there mark any patrols with different marks.

stepTasks.comment: What you want to do here is kill all the mobs and the patrols towards the boss in the main hall, preferably 1 by 1, to avoid getting sandwiched while killng the quest's target.

The priests are the dangerous ones because they heal (themselves or others) when low. Either trap them to interrupt the cast or burst them down. You can pull them by LoSing the Mind Blasts. When ready take off the disguise by clicking its buff
Once the main hall is clear, TURN OFF GROWL and pull Beve with Distracting shot. You want her agroed on you all the time, otherwise your pet will get destroyed.

Hide behind the corner every time she is about to end a frostbolt cast and then peek around so she starts casting it again. This way you can kill her w/o getting hit a single time. This method works against any casters that try to cast something all the time.

subTasks.comment: Accept the quest from the item she dropped

stepTasks.comment: When done, put on your disguise again and go towards the mages' tower

subTasks.comment: Clear around the entrance to enter the tower safely. You can use the same method you used with Beve to kill these or you can facetank them with your pet if it's a 1v1

stepTasks.comment: When done, put your disguise on again and go towards Arathi. We are going to buy the first aids book and get the FP
Get on this corner and jump towards the empty space between the bridge and the tree. You will clip there, which will allow you to jump again, now into the bridge, to skip the entire area.
Buy scrolls, pots and ALL the first aids books, we are never comming back here. We will learn them later.
Get the FP and fly to Southshore
If you finished any of the attack/defense of hillsbrad tower quest, turn them in
Fly to Menethil
Make sure you HS is set to Menethil, otherwise, set it after landing
It's not necessary to accept it now, but do so just in case
>>> REFILL ARROWS <<<
First kill Snelling for the key and then board the ship from [14,28]
Kill the giant crocolisks to get the pelts
When done, go to this house to sell junk. You cna also buy the bronze tube if you don't want that and even some decent armor.
Kill the 2 gnoll camps to finish fire taboo
Pray to RNGesus for a fast bag (10% drop...). (not so) Fun fact: SIDA means AIDS in spanish. If you ever play this game in spanish the quest asks you to get an AIDS bag :/
Go here and sell junk. Finish fire taboo if you haven't yet somehow.
Turn on Track Hidden and kill the 3 Fen Creepers around [54,42] and [54,37] to progress the quest
Heal the messenger
When you are close to being done with the war banners, go to the next task's waypoint to drop to the excavation site
Jump down
Get the fossil on the ground

subTasks.questName: In Search of The Excavation Team
In Search of The Excavation Team

stepTasks.comment: Loot the dirt pile for the fossil
Kill all the screechers near the 3 nests then get away from the mountain range to kill de regular one while going back to the excavation site
Go back to the excavation site
Clear the entire lower floor of the excavation site clockwise. You want the  raptors to your left (the west) to die last so they don't respawn.
As soon as you see one of the blue ones, kill it. You need it to respawn because there are only 9 of them in the area and you need 10
Gather the fossils meanwhile
When done with the lower level go to or finish the quest at the spot where Sarltooth is
Now make sure you are done with the quest and kite (rank 1 arcane shot) Sarltooth towards the dwarves
KILL Sarltooth ONLY AFTER YOU HAVE ACCEPTED THE NEXT PART
Say hello to the only ranged weapon you are going to get unitll level 42...
HS back to Menethil
>>> Refill arrows <<<
If you don't have the MP5 boots from the crab in Darkshore, pick the boots. Otherwise, sell the staff (the one from Hillsbrad is better)

subTasks.questName: In Search of The Excavation Team

stepTasks.comment: First go here and follow the water towards the sea. Kill the 3 Fen creepers (6/10)
Leave your pet in the water. Climb to the top of the ship sing the broken sail and pull Halyndor.
The ship has a crack underwater on the northern side where you can get to the box.
This is only worthwile if you want to try your luck at getting Tidal Charm

Go to the spot and scan the area for Prince Nazjak. In Trinity core he "should" always be at the turtle's corpse (south-west of the area). If he is anywhere near the ruins or inside the ships, forget about it.
This is assuming Eredun hasn't forgotten to allow hunters to use Eagle eye after disabling it in beta 1 more than 1.5 years ago...

Hunters can solo this, but it has a bit of RNG. The objective is to kite him to the coast where you came from. Trap him, slow him, stun him with your pet etc. Once you get back on your feet its a matter of kitting.
If you manage to kill him, it's still a coin toss whether the trinket drops or not...
Go here towards [35,33] and kill the Fen creepers you are missing
Go here, pull make-a-wish-Nek'rosh, jump down and kite him towards the green warden
Go here and kite Balgaras towards the dwarves in Dun Modr (bridge to Arathi)

subTasks.comment: You can outrange Shadowbolt Volley. Just keep healing your pet to cleanse the roots and heal the aoe damage. Trap the voidwalker so it ends up laging behind and it will eventually despawn

stepTasks.comment: Talk to the dwarf with the ? turn-in sign twice and then to the one to his left (you right) once
Balagaras will be dead (or close to) about when you get to the bridge
Sac pet and interact with the dwarf's corpse. Don't turn on cheetah untill you are outside of the building, these mobs hit through walls...
Jump off from [43,91] with cheetah on.
Interact with the letter in the left hand of the dwarf's corpse (the one that's orientated towards the north)
Get out of the water here
Pet passive, pet stay, send pet to pull all the mobs. Pet passive again so it runs back and despawns. While the mobs follow it, detonate the cart of explisive and get out crossing the bridge
Grab the FP to Southshore
Fly to Menethil
Fly to Loch Modan
Long run to Ironforge
Buy weapon skills + the green level 30 quiver. You can even store it in your current quiver until you hit 30
Train spells
Get the FP
Take the tram and train first aids (book + wool bandages) while waiting/on it
Hopefully you get to 150 first aid, otherwise no silk bandages for you :(
If you reached 150 first aid, go learn slik bandages
Store the first aids books you weren't able to learn except the one for Heavy silk bandages
Train weapon skills
Buy 1 Stormwind Seasoning herbs for the quest in Duskwood
Buy the Wild steelbloom he has in stock. You need a goldthorn too if you ever find one while questing (off a chest, f.ex.)
Get the FP
Go here, near the border and jump then press W to fall bellow slowly the the stone walls that let you walk up to the valley of heroes
If it's nightime, enter Duskwood from this place near the border. Otherwise run straight to Darkshire
There is a custom quest that can only be completed by killing a mob that only spawns at night. Keep an eye out for when the daycicle changes so you can complete the quest.
Sadly, the timer that decides which part of the day cycle is happening doesn't seem consistent, varies between some hours to a couple of minutes, so just keep an eye out.
Look for Plagued Shambler alongside the river if it's night time. He spawns at [64,17]

subTasks.comment: If you found it, kite it towards Darkshire and accept the WANTED quest near the townhall

stepTasks.comment: Grab the FP

Go towards Abercrombie and kill AT LEASST 8 Skeletal Fiends and enough to finish the custom quest. We are far from done running to Raven Hill...

Take your pet out because one of those ghosts that curse id about to respawn. Trap or intimidate

lf you already have the Old History Book, no its a good time to go to [77,30] inside Stormwind keep and turning it in.

She moves around

Cool sword, too bad the weapon training skill system is garbage and you don't get to use your weapon for 30-60 min if you haven't used that weapon type since level 10 or so. Don't worry, you can buy a better staff in STV
This part is really cool if you have claustrophobia
Kill the 5 Plague Spreaders surrounding the tomb (the one at the slope doesn't count).
Be aware of the rare ghoul here, it can easily kill you if you ass pull many other mobs aswell.
Kill every plague spreader in the first hallway and the first "open" space. You should be at 15/20
There is one more in the next room (16/20). Go to the other crypt through this hole.
We are looking to kill the raiders here (16 spawns and you need 15...). There is one in the room you entered through and then one more to the room to your right (west on minimap) from this waypoint
There is 1 more here in this waypoint and another one in the room to your right (west on minimap).
You should be at 4/15 when leaving the crypt. Go outside and kill everything there
There are 2 more in the road around [19,39]. Once you are done go to Morbent's house atop the hill and finish the 2 quests by killing the ones around/inside the house

Interact with the crate

Now for the last named mob. If you leave the area jumping off of it it looks really cool
Go kill Nek'rosh II: the revenge. He was a pusheover. Can pet tank in the main hall. If that's not the case anymore, just kite him to the entrance

Finish off the quest. Try to outrange the mage to pull it outside the camp

Don't bother with the follow up yet
Don't bother with the follow up yet

Killing the regular version takes a while and can be done by LoSing casts, but was completing the quest. Up to you. If the quest doesn't complete just abandon it, we are never getting back here.

subTasks.comment: You might want to buy 1 stack of lvl 35 water. You can do some AoE pulls with Explosive trap now that you just got the first rank (it's when it's most powerful relative to mob HP)

The shield in the wall

From now on and until level 40 or so when explosive trap dmg starts to fall off relative to mob HP, you should try to do the following in group of mobs that you outlevel and are grouped together

Place an explosive trap while you send your pet to gather a bunch of mobs (you can help with range attacks on far away ones) then take agro off of you with growl/intimidate. Start healing your pet as soon as you have gathered 3 and have growled them off of you.

When 5 of them or so are gathered bring them back to the trap to trigger it. Once your trap is off CD again place another explosive trap, cas multishot and the feign death. Keep mend pet up and the mobs will die shortly after.
Practice with the wyverns in the area we are headed to. Yer a mage, Hunter
Go to the Wyvern area. The cat is there inside the nest and hard to see if you don't turn the camera to look inside. Target the cat (/target Cody) and use the carrier

subTasks.comment: Any wyvern can drop the leather and the venom

/target Race Master then /beg
/target Wizzle then /beg
/target Razzeric then /plead
/target Trackmaster then /plead
Right click it as soon as you get it to use it
Right click on the device to get on top of the tower and give some water to the NPCs (3/10)

stepTasks.comment: Kill all the Basilisks in this area. A couple of them are close together, so consider clearing some of the pulls with AOE as it was explained earlier.

stepTasks.comment: As you move around the salt flats gather the 30 car parts and kill any beast you that drops something that you are missing, specially the Vultures for the bones!!! (very few of them)

After killing the ghost use the item you just looted to accept a follow up quest
Keep killing quest mobs near the mountain range towards the tower, don't miss the one at the base as usual (9/10)
AOE the 3 vultures... BTW, in classic there are more than twice as many here, that's why I told you to go out of your way to kill the vultures

Keep killing quest mobs towards the tower. You should be done with the NPC at the base. If you are still missing 3 don't worry, the 3 at the base camp are off cooldown again and can be used to finish the quest.
Go towards the tortoise area. You can AOE these down (max 5 at a time), but properly prepare and have full mana, max pet HP, keep Mend pet up at all times and have Bestial Wrath if possible

subTasks.comment: Most likely you will be close to being done after a single AOE pull. Simply go on, no need to stay here as you can finish this by killing the roaming ones.

stepTasks.comment: Go here. You will see a totem near the slope. Pull a bunch of mobs and die near it. This quest can only be turned on while dead...

In beta 3 the quest was bugged and wasn't awarding XP, but theoretically you should be getting 3.4k XP + the warmode bonus (if you have it)
Go towards the crater and start killing some basilisks (4/10)
The north and kill some more (8-9/10)
Go towards this vulture. You should be done with basilisk + tortoises
Finally go here if somehow not done with scorpids.
Shooping list ahead. Most likely you will be missing some vulture bones. Simply go east after going through the base camp and finish the quest
The only folow up you should have accepted is the one from the goblin (Goblin Sponsorship)`. Make sure you have it then go towards gadgetzan
Get the FP then HS back to Theramore

AoE 4 (max 5) Murlocs at a time. Kill any of the ones that are not close together while waiting for trap CD. Yer a mage now, hunter.

subTasks.comment: The droprate is awful, but you HAVE to finish this now.

When you arrive at Rebel camp Private Throsen may begin patroling. If so, do anything else you have to do on camp and then follow him. Kill the 2 Kurzen agents and he will give you an extra quest

However, this event was bugged and never happens (even if the devs said they fixed it in one of the betas...). Chances are you will be locked out of the entire Jungle Secrets quest line. If so, just don't bother with it.
If he is not there or begins patroling just skip this step and finish anything else on camp.

If Thorsen is patroling or he wasn't there check [40,8] to see if he is fighting the Kurzen agents. If not, go to the slope at [38,4] and do the mountain skip we did while in Duskwood, but towards Nesingwary's camp

Back to the camp to turn it in then do mountain skip

stepTasks.comment: >Track beasts< On your way down the mountain kill the 4 Basilisks (2 are to the west, 1 to the east, 1 in front of you) and the crocks near the river
Kill the tigers and the crocolisks near the camp and the river, probably you will finish the quests near the western end of the riverside

subTasks.comment: If you don't finish it somehow, skip the step and kill extras when doing Panther mastery Pt.1 or when running back to the camp.

stepTasks.comment: If you couldn't get Thorsen's quest, check with eagle eye if he is patrolling.
Some of the panthers are grouped up together, you can AoE them with explosive trap
You can deal with the grouped up mobs easily woth AoE, even against multiple Medicine Mans. Loot the supplies
Only if you got Thorsen's quest, upper floor in the house. Otherwise, skip this part of the step
Go east and kil the fighters and the medicine mans for their respective quests. You can AoE down the lumbermill easily, just try to LoS Bookie Herod so he doesn't cast Shadow bolt constantly

subTasks.comment: You probably won't finish killing all the fighters untill you come back and they respawn

Now here and do finish killing the tigers. Probably will be done when near the Venture Co. camp
Back to the Kurzen camp, AoE the mobs down to finish whichever quest you haven't finished yet
If you still don't have Thorsen's quest you have another chance to get it here
Do something
Through the usual mountain skip in rebel camp. Kill some extra basilisks here again.
Go here and start killing the panthers towards the south west. There are just enough to finish the quest.
Should be done with the Panthers here. Then start working on the raptors.

subTasks.comment: Even if the raptors are together don't over do it. The baby raptors hit hard and won't despawn after killing the big ones.

stepTasks.comment: After killing the 10 raptors go here and discover the island.
Now go here and climp up the slope
Run here while killing the basilisks. You can pull the ones below with your pet/by shooting them.
Go here and kill the Elder tigers. First kill the one at this spot and the one to its left, then start circling the mound counter clock wise.
You should be finishing the quest around this spot, under the bridge.

If you don't have Thorsen's quest go to the road where the event happens and check if he is there or if he is patrolling with eagle eye. If you already got the quest or after accepting it HS back to Booty bay
Don't accept the follow up yet
Don't accept the follow up either
Go to the bank and store any Green hills pages you may have.
If you want to try and tame the rare spectral triger you should stable your pet now too. After you get to rebel camp simply tame w/e beast that's around (and you have food for!!!)

>>> FILL QUIVER <<<

You can go through the troll camp and clear it while on your way. You will need keys.
If you stabled your pet one of the elder tigers around Sin'Dall's mound is a good temporary substitute.
Go to the troll ruins and begin to gather keys and ears by killing troll.
The Mystics hit extremely hard (as every caster NPC does...). Don't pull more than one at a time
Whenever you find gfind an alliance captive go free it. You will probably have to go out of your way to finish this. Go to the next step
Go to the tablet on top of the ruins first.
Now to this tablet. Check the shopping list before leaving Troll City
Go to the elementals' island and kill them
To do this step w/o using a water breathing elixir first EXACTLY to this coordinate go here.
Now swim straight down. When you pull the Murlocs trap them and/or send your pet. Sac your pet if necessary and after you loot the table feign death.
Finally go here and loot the last tablet
Go AoE clear this raptor camp and then keep killing raptors to the south-east, towards the delta of the river.
Should be done around this spot.
Begin killing Crocolisks here and run north towards the Venture Co. camp
If you got bad RNG on pelts kill the crocks inside the lake
Check with eagle eye if there is an albino rare crocolisks at the north part of the lake (Gena). If so, kill it for a dagger that selss for 1g.
Go to the top platform and kill Foreman Cozzle to get his key.
Drop down to the lumbermill and kill the Venture Co. Mechanics. They should drop a custom item that starts a quest.
Loot the blueprints from the chest unlocking it with the key you looted from the Foreman
Make your way towards the panthers to the east while getting the crystals from the geologists.
Track hidden on and run around this mound killing the stealthed panthers.
Back to the Kurzen camp. If you got Thorsen's quest later make a detour the the house with the records ([43,9]) before entering the cave to finish the first part.
Only if you are on Thorsen's questline. Otherwise skip this after killing the commandos and hexshrinkers.
When everything that you could do is done HS back to booty bay
Don't accept the follow up yet
Jump down and store Greenhill pages

Don't accept the follow up yet

Only if you did Thorsen's questline
Only if you did Thorsen's questline
Through the usual mountain skip

subTasks.comment: Manually skip this step. No quest ID currently

stepTasks.comment: >>> SET HS <<<
Skipping Crushridge warmongers from Redpath outside the town hall
To Dalaran's crater. Turn in the quest and accept the follow up.  Don't accept Magical Materiel (takes too long).
Go here to get into Alterac Mountains then go North
Now here to get into the ruins. If you find the rare yeti don't get too close to him, he fears. Kill him at range.
Clear your way to the town hall. The tall building you can see north-east as you enter thorugh the hole. Prioritize enforcerers and mages over warmongers (slower to kill) to get the books.

As you enter type /target Grel'Borg and put a mark. Keep looking for him, he patrols. When he is on a safe spot out of the castle just kill him while draining his mana. Interrput rain of fire with intimidation + traps.
Inside the townhall. Trap the ogre inside, loot the book then run out + feign death
Make sure you have the 5 books that drop from any ogre before leaving!
Some potions in the goblin. If the recipe is limited stock buy it.
Drop down here
In the small house wait for Nancy to go outside then pull and kill grandpa. You can also try to split pull them. Don't fight them both at the same time, Nancy won't stop healing him.
Gather the Watermelons for Watermelon Punch custom quest. Didn't do it during the beta, but it's most likely here.
Kill the Orc (Nagaz). Mind the stealthed mobs.
Go inside the house and loot the small wooden chest. Use the parchment to start a quest
Go east towards WPL. You should already have the signets or be almost done. Simply split pull the Argus mages in each camp (4 camps, 4 mages).

If you were trying to get the rare spectral tiger he is usually around [44,17]. Abandon the temp pet if you find it then tame it. You can also just kill him for a 40s vendor pendant, the winterspring blue tiger is more cool.
Also, if you somehow got the Assassin Letter in the event of Southshore (it's bugged, the cryer never starts it) Baron Vardus is in the first encampment of the slope [48,17]
When done, HS back to Southshore or grab WPL FP if you didn't before then HS (you should have the first time you went to Alterac for the ogres).

subTasks.comment: No ID since I couldn't do it during beta. Don't know if there is a follow up either.

stepTasks.comment: Second floor >>> Fill quiver <<<
Fly to Arathi Highlands. Keep an eye out for the Forsaken courier and Fozruk while flying. Chances are if they don't show up they are the beggining of their patrol routes.
The turn in is from a random drop from 30 something mobs. You most likely won't have it. Just accept the quest.
Enter the cave through the slope behind the tree here.
Inside the cave go here to get to the upper level where you will turn in the quest
Surveyors hit hard and try to root you!!! (NPC casters and elemental damage in general is not overbuffed by custom changes BTW)
Loot 1 of the keys
Also take note where Fozruk (the giant) is. Patrols don't move unless they are in render distance of someone. He also starts his route here, so chances are he won't get too far away.
Inside this house is where the courier spanws. Chances are he is there if you didn't spot him before. Otherwise, follow the road.
Spllit the Courier but don't leave the bodyguards near the house because we are about to go there
If you can'f find the Courier just skip these steps and go straight to the troll camp. Try to finish it later
Follow the Nelf. You can try to kill the orcs ahead of time so she doesn't stop.
Loot another key. Be careful with the eles. They outlevel you and hit hard.
Go to the troll cabe. Prioritize Shadowhunters > Witch Doctor > The rest. The Shadowhunter can only be found inside the cave.
After you get the knife make your way out towards the eatern mountain range. Should be able to finish the rest on the way out.
Go here to enter the elemental plateau
Try to avoid the spiders since they try to root you
If you see a Gryphon called Fireplume flying around put a mark on it. You have to find it during one of the quests
Go here. Get full HP then fall down.

The quest Save the animals has been bugged in betas 2.5 and 3, but I could it complete during beta 2. Basically, she will ask you to find the Gryphon I mentioned earlier and then will need meat from the spiders and berries from the berry bushes you might have seen while walking there.

I will be detailing the other quests as if the follow ups to the bugged one didn't exists since I don't remember their order exactly. The idea is to find the gryphon after you get out of the dwarves' fields while cooling the fire elementals and then, before going to talk to the water elemental, turn it in to unlock the other quests that ask you for food. This way you can do 3 gathering quests at the same time.
If the quest works at the end of the questline you will get a free flight to Aerie peak. Make sure you get the FP there before going back to the dwarves in Arathi.
Skip this step after reading

Use the rope on the animals then bring them back to the dwarf at the docks. Remove Cheetah while running to her because the animals tend to lag behind. This is the step that is usually bugged, you don't get progression after bringing them back. Finish the other 2 quests anyways

subTasks.comment: In the berry bushes in the fields.
Accept the follow up if it's not bugged anymore

stepTasks.comment: Get the MP5 food, better than 10 agi.
Go around the mound using the item the quest gave you when the fire elementals are below 30-40% hp
If the dwarf's quest wasn't bugged, turn on Track Beasts to try to find Fireplume
If the dwarf's quest wans't bugged. Turn in the quest about finding the gryphon then accept the follow ups. Go talk to the water ele afterwards
Go towards the mound of the fire elemental while closing the vents. Run laps around the mound killing raptors for the feathers.

subTasks.comment: Run counter clockwise around the mound ideally ending in the southern part of it
If the dwarf's quest wasn't bugged, go turn the spider meat and the berries quest then do the rest before turning the water elemental's quests.

stepTasks.comment: Skip this step. TODO: If the dwarf's quest is fixed this is probably where you go do it

subTasks.comment: Ask the water ele for an audience with the air ele.
Ask the air ele to go back to the water ele...

stepTasks.comment: Use the item from the quest on the hostile water elementals when they are 30-40% HP
Wait out the RP event. Apparently Earth dude is no more and troll neighbours are to blame.
Go slightly past this rock to comple the objective. Then, turn the quest at the rock
Chances are the first troll you kill will drop the item that begins the elite quest. If not, kil a few more. Accept the quest and turn it in at the rock
Kill the berserkers around the hut in front of you to 1v1 the elite. You can pet tank it no problem, just pop CDs and keep mend pet up.
Kill the trolls on your way towards the cave. Probably don't need to kill every single one since they will respawn on your way back.
As you enter the cave go to the first hallway to the left. The elite is at the end of it.

subTasks.comment: This elite is a caster. Elite casters are busted, but the ones that constantly cast can be cheesed by hidding behind a corner every time they are about to finish a cast. Turn growl off, use distracting shot and everytime she is about to finish a cast hide behind the rock to your right

stepTasks.comment: Go back towards the rock while finishng any remaining quest. Shopping list ahead.
Back at the rock
HS back to Southshore
Cool pants
>>> Refill quiver <<< Second floor of the house
Fly to Arathi Highlands
Get the last key
Access the Naga area by following the road here
Escort the gnome
Equip the googles and drink one of your Elixir of Water Breathing
Basically go boat to boat retrieving charts and logs, killing the Nagas and gathering gems
Enter the first ship through this "window" (not the hole below). Dismiss your pet before going in.
The log is inside a kettle in the very first room
Continue in the current floor inside the ship. Go through the doorframe to the west then enter the next room through the door to your right (north). The charts are to the left as you go in.
Exit the ship through one of the windows to the north. Dismiss your pet before doing so.
Enter the second ship through the "window" here. Dismiss pet before going in.
The charts are to your left as you go in.

Exit the ship through the window with a cannon north west of where the charts you just looted were (dismiss pet...). Then, swim downwards and enter the lower level through the hole of the ship. The logs will be in the floor in front of you

subTasks.comment: There might be also a chest to your left

stepTasks.comment: Finish the killing quest and the gems' quest by finishing the lap counter clockwise
Go back to Arathi through the same tunnel you got here.
Enter the Ogre cave here. The quest NPC is at the end.

Go find Fozruk. He patrols around the 4 elemental stones (all the area). However, he doesn't move if he is not in render distance of someone, so chances are that you will find him by using eagle eye between the elemental stones from this tree.

subTasks.comment: Mind you, Eagle eye has a limit render distance on Trinity Core, it's not like classic where you can render anything as long as you dont leave your current zone.

Kite him towards the elemental stone to the southwest (the one that gave you the quest). The adds will eventually give up. Toggle cower in your pet and spam distracting shot on CD. He will knock you down if he gets too close, so keep your distance.

stepTasks.comment: Place a trap before turning this in. An elite giant will spawn and try to kill you. Trap (or sac pet), run and FD.
Buy 1 stack (x20) of level 35 meat. Your pet will get sacced A LOT very soon.
With some luck you are very close to getting level 40. You probably don't have enough for mount, so just try to learn level 40 spells, specially to use mail.
Silk donation. You should have more than enough. Only 1 of each type will give you XP
Tram to SW, first aid if you have any mageweave. Save 15 silk for a quest and store it in bank when you get back to booty bay.
Learn spells if you reached 40
Fly to Booty Bay
Don't accept Zanzil's Secret yet
>>> Set HS <<< And buy a stack (x20) of lvl35 water, you will need it.
Bank x15 Silk Cloth
>>> Refill quiver <<< But mind you, if you are about to hit 40 simply wait untill you level up to buy better arrows (or fill everything but 2 slots with lvl 40 arrows)
Jump into the water and swim north

Killing order -> Duncan (gets pulled alone) -> First Raider to the right (pulls alone) -> First mage to the right run backwards so he moves slighlty towards you, so your pet can get into melee w/o ass pulling -> Turn in + accept quest then FD the las 2 mobs

Go here then climb to the goblin's statue. Place a frost trap hugging the statue, tunr on Cower and turn off growl on you pet. Pull the giant and spam distracting shot on CD while running circles around the statue: perma slowed 0% resist chance.
Kill the giant, loot the belt and use it to accept the quest.

Kill all the swashbucklers on your way here. Try to avoid the warlocks, specially the ones with a succubus. If you have to fight one, trap trhe succubus otherwise you will get hit by a 400 damage lash of pain.
Interact with the dirt pile to loot the chest
Back to booty bay. Check the shopping list. If you didn't find the eye yet don't worry, there will be more chances.
Kill all the pirates on the way to booty bay.
Then go where the giant is

Growl off, cower on, mend pet always up (he does AoE damage around him) and distracting shot if needed. Your goal is to kite him towards the entrance of booty bay while dealing AT LEAST half of his HP. The guards will finish him off for you.
Hardest thing in the entire guide and probably not doable on a non-hunter. Skip this when done reading

Go to this ship first and clear the pirates on the deck, then kill Garr Salthoof. Since he is a Tauren his model goes through the deck, so he will get pulled through walls (and attack you aswell). His "charge" attack will deal half your HP, so try to get agro on your pet ASAP while he runs.

subTasks.comment: Afterwards heal your pet to full, put it on passive and set your pet to stay outside of the ship (near the palm tree, f.ex.).

Go back on board and /target Captain to target Keelhaul. Command your pet to attack him and once he is aggroed press dive/sprint and put your pet on passive again. Your pet will run to the last stay position and will pull Keelhaul outside of his room. Hit/distract shot him and then jump off the ship with disengage towards the opposite direction your pet is going.

Your pet will despawn by distance before dying to mobs and Keelhaul will be chasing you. Once your pet despawns, resummon it, attack Keelhaul with it and feign death after it gets aggro. 1v1 the quest mob and go to the next ship.

stepTasks.comment: Now to the second ship. Same thing but /target Fleet (Firallon) and try to jump off the ship towards the east (3rd ship)

3rd ship, but this one we will be doing something different. Kill the pirates on deck then get inside the ship. Luckily you can pull everything here one by one and there is only 1 magus you need to fight.

subTasks.comment: While on the middle level, hug your left (north) and kill the 2 pirates patrolling there. Before going through the doorframe that goes to the level below look right (south) and loot Cortello's riddle
In theory this thing spawns in the 3 ships at the same time in Trinity Core. This one is the easiest to get by far, the other ones are on the lowest level of the ships and are too hard to get.

stepTasks.comment: After you get the quest (if you don't find it here skip it, -20k XP and a bag) /target Captian and do the usual or kill it by split pulling him from the mage.
Go to Jaguero isle and hug the west shoreline to try to avoid the stealthed panthers (Track hidden). Loot the dirt pile

Btw, if you are wondering why these kinds of split pulling shenanigans work is because, yes, it's not blizzlike. Social aggroed mobs don't get aggro "pulses" when you hit a mob that's "tethered" to them, so you can reset and split them by getting aggro on a different unit (you) other than the original target (your pet) and then making the original target despawn.
Now go do the gorilla related quests. Equip the helmet.
You need 10 gorilla fangs to summon the gorillas for STV Fever
When you are about to kill and Elder Mistvale Gorilla (30-40%) use the helmet to finish them off. You can't get loot so no giblets or fangs. Get this done ASAP
When you get 10 gorilla fangs go here. The summon is possibly bugged. If it doesn't work just abandone and go back to booty bay

subTasks.comment: Give him the fangs to start the event

stepTasks.comment: Only if the summoning wasn't bugged
Don't acccept the follow up yet
>>> Refill quiver <<<
Kill Bhag'thera. Can pet tank or kite around a tree with trap. Becareful with the stealthed panther near the target
Any troll for the tusks, Mystics for the fetishes. Go towards the south west while killing
Any goblin drops the crystals
When questing around here the mobs will drop a relic that starts a quest. Accept the quest
Kill the raptors towards the elite one.

This sounds dumb but it's actually easier than it seems. You are going to kite the elite raptor towards Nesingwary camp, turn the prequest, accept the last raptor quest (kill the raptor you are kiting) and then finishing the elite off.

Simply use arcane shot rank 1 on CD (Tethis has to reach Nesingwary's alive). If it misses, stop and shoot one auto shot. If you want to be safe, you can try to sneak an autoshot if you are max range and need some mana. But do too many of these and the raptor will die, so be careful.
If you come across a mob while kiting (track beasts on and look at minimap) just send your pet and attack it once with it.

YOU CAN'T TOUCH THE WATER or he will reset. You have to get him to the road the same way you came to the raptors' area. The easiest way to do it is by running through south of Bangalsh's mound, there is only 1 stealthed panther on the road and that's it.
When done reading go near the raptor, full mana, skip the step and GL
Once you reach the camp you can send yor pet to the raptor and pet tank it (only FD after your pet hits it once) or kite with traps around a tree.
Drop chance for Excelsior is not 100%. Go to this one first and run north to find 2 more if you need to.

Go here then swim downwards. Click the Altar to summon the goblin then pull it and swim upwards to resurface. Can be done w/o aggroing the murlocs. If you do, just finish summoning then swim upwards + FD to reset them, then pull the gobo.
Finally, go here and interact with the sand pile to loot the music box
HS back to Booty Bay
Jump down and store pages in the bank as needed. Pray to RNGesus you are close to being done. After swamp will be the final chance to get the pages you are missing (15 pages total)
Don't accept the follow up yet
Fly to >>> Rebel camp <<< We are turning in a quest before swamp of sorrows
>>> Refill quiver <<<
Fly to Darkshire
>>> Set HS <<< in Darkshire

subTasks.comment: You will see a quest on your way here and back, ignore it (will accept later since it's timed)

stepTasks.comment: Only if you found the riddle at the pirate ship

Some things about SoS: there is a flight path and an inn, but the FP was bugged in beta 3. You couldn't fly to it and fly flying from it made you go through the mountains to Redridge before redirecting you towards your actual destination. That's why we set HS in Darkshire
Also, the devs got one guyed into changing the broken draenei models to the ugly ass Lost Ones from vanilla.
The WANTED post
Up the stairs. Top floor
Discover the FP
Loot the rod. Don't bother killing anything yet. Also, keep an eye out for sparkles in the ground to gather the chilies for the quest
Now kill every spider, jaguar and crock you see while heading here. Do it so while circling counter-clockwise around the area.

Very RNG heavy quest but mobs are easy to kill, there are a bunch oh chilis around here and you can just kill them again after they respawn. 50% chance aprox. to get the plans after killing all (14) of the elementals
When done, go back to the human in the south. Kill jaguars and crocks if you still need pelts
If you are missing skins get them now.
And sell junk aswell
Go here and kill Noboru the Cudgel. He drops an item that strats a quest
Go here now and kill the elite spider. Ez pet tank

Now go north to the road and then go to the waypoint (end of the lost ones' village) while looting crystal and killing fishermans for the rod. You can ignore the rest, they will respawn on your way out.
Go to the cart and loot the chest
While escorting the human and after clearing the camp in the waypoint loot the crate and accept the quest
Escort quest ends around this spot. He is suicidal, so keep a focus tab on him and assit him if he takes damage
You should already be done with the chilis. If not look around for the remaining ones
Go to the tarantulas running through the south of Stonard. While you are at it, check on a database where "Shadow Panther"s are.
You really want to look this up. There are 12 stealthed panthers scattered across the entire east of SoS and you need 8 drops that are not guarenteed. The quest is not well thought out.
Jump into the lake and drink you 2nd Elixir of Water Breathing. Gather the relics and discover the temple

subTasks.comment: If you have an addon with markers on the minimap (pfQuest f.ex.) know that some of the markers are from the pre-dungeon area and not the actual lake. Just do a lap clockwise and you should be done

stepTasks.goalName: Search for the Temple of Atal'Hakkar

stepTasks.comment: Go here to kill another panther, then go north while killing panther and crocks (look up the panther and crocolisks spawns)
With some luck you will be done with panthers and crocks around here. If not, finish it with the respawns while running south down the coast later (look up next step)

Go here and run south down the coast while killing crabs and gathering wood. Mind you, the area is EXTREMELY buggy pathing wise for NPCs and pets (unless fixed). Toengage the crabs dismiss your pet, stand besides them and summon it again. Otherwise they will perma evade.

subTasks.comment: Most driftwoods are in the southern half of the coast, where the murlocs are

stepTasks.comment: Don't bother with the rare custom crab. 2 minute fight for 50s (or do if you are desperate for gold mount...)
When done with the crabs, the driftwood, the panthers and the crocks hearth back to Darkshire.
Now the quest we left behind
Fly to The Harborage (custom SoS flightpath). If it's still bugged and doesnt show on the map simply walk back there.
Quest turn in order is scuffed because I can't know how you will get back to the quest hub. Simply turn in all, no need to accept anything else anymore.
Go around town feeding the stew to the NPCs
To Nethergarde to turn in quests. Run up the tower first
Discover the FP then fly to booty bay

You are probably level 42 now. If so, equip the Massive Longbow. Ranged weapon progression: starter bow -> lvl 3 vendor ->lvl 14 vendor -> lvl 26 quest -> lvl 42 vendor -> lvl 52 quest. Very good XD!11!1.
Top floor
Jump down and accept this
Go to the bank and retrieve all the STV pages, pray to RNGesus. You need 15 and this is the last run north.
Check the AH for pages
Back inside the inn
>>> SET HS <<<
>>> Refill arrows <<<
Go here by jumping off the BB docks. If you are low on Green Hill pages oyu might want to kill all the pirates by going the regular way
Here afterwards and kill the nagas. Go to the fountain up the mountain for free 60s if rare is up
Wave you mouse around the leaves here, the node is there but it's too hard too see...
Go to the south-western path of the arena. If you are desperate for pages, kill the pirates around (skip the warlocks)
Now to the Zanzil ruins
Kill Jon Jon
Kill Chucky and finish getting the 12 mixtures (might take 2 full clears)
Back to the southern road of the arena
And then to the pirate ship
Go to the captain's room and kill Captain Teuta

Go to Bangalash's mound and kill the stealthed panther on the north side. Play rin around the rosie by placing a frost trap (same way you killed the giant in booty bay). Some adds will spawn a 50%. Let your pet take agroo and ignore them
If you got all 15 pages w/o using the AH this is the run
Fly to Stormwind if you have at least 90g you will be able to buy your mount now.
Take the tram to IF and craft bandages. You should be level 225 by now.

If you don't have 90g for your mount then HS back to booty bay here. You will have enough after questing in Dustwallow. If that's the quest, check the steps in this section after this point and do them after finishing the next section (before flying to Gadgetzan).
Skip this step. If you are not buying the mount now then skips steps until one of them tells you to HS back to Booty bay
Fly to Menethil harbor
Check the mailbox if the boat to darkshore is not around. If it is, do it in Darnassus
Fly to Darnassus
Check the mailbox near the bank if you didn't get it in Menethil
Learn riding if you have 90g
Pick your favourite tiger. The best one is the piss colored one ofc.
Learn spells (how to use mail armor) if you have any spare money
HS back to booty bay
At the inn, lower floor
Retrieve the Murloc heads and the turtles tongues from the bank (the quests from Dustwallow)
Skip the follow up
Will have to wait out a role play to turn the last one in. Just do some bandages or something
Take the boat to Ratchet
Fly to Theramore
This was bugged during beta, but hopefully (it better be) fixed by launch. If you have 225 firs aid (you should) turn friendly nameplates on and bind the quest item.
Critically injured > Badly injured > Injured
Learn any FA recipes if possible. Skip this afterwards.
Upstairs
Skip follow up
>>> Set HS <<<
On top of the watchtower
Jump into the water and swim here. Then run up to the crashed zeppelin.

subTasks.questName: Where In The World Is Beezil Linkspanner?

stepTasks.comment: Go around the area killing the oozes, looting them and looting the crates. If you see that Bubbling oozes have +5k HP is because they are still bugged and have their elite values. Try to avoid those.

subTasks.comment: For these you can just check in any database for the world object "Zeppelin Cargo" since those are from an actual quest even if they are custom here. The boxes don't sparkle and they are brown, like the ENTIRE ZONE >:(. No need to wear your eyes down,

subTasks.questName: Where In The World Is Beezil Linkspanner?

stepTasks.comment: Turn in track humanoids and use the defibrilator on the goblins
Mudsprocket doesn't exist, but this guy was moved here
Move to this area while killing any raptors on the way
If you did the questline

subTasks.comment: Kill around the cave (can try to AoE some of them with the dynamite from STV quests) then move back south when you are almost done

stepTasks.comment: The banner is dropped by the Scalebanes inside the cave. Use the totem in the bodies of any dragon to gather the essence. Mind you, Ash tails do a lot of fire damage.
Go here and follow the road nort-east while interacting with the bones of the ogres. Kill the spirits to get quest progression
Weirdly the other NPCs don't try to help him. Just don't burst him and actually kill him. At 40% let the pet finish him off.
Go north to the spiders' mine. You can AoE down these
Escort this guy. Try to pull mobs that are ahead of him so he doesn't stop walking
Skip the follow up
Go to the shore and south. Escort this guy to Theramore. Keep a focus tab on him, he can get bursted down fast.
Upstairs
Fly to Ratchet
Select the dialog option and he will give you the quest item
Back to Theramore
Go to the Grimtotem village. Get the armaments from the weapon stands and the plans from the elders

subTasks.comment: Get 4 notes from the elders to combine into the quest item

stepTasks.comment: If the 2 apprentices' quests are available (3), accept them and do them. Not detailed here but will have indications later when to do them
Burn the 3 tents with the torch. There is a forsaken in one of the tens. Kill her to get an item that starts a quest
Use the letter to accept the quest
If Tabetha's apprentices' quests were available kill the 12 Grimtotems here
Don't cheat and try to go to the cave first. The robot will bug out its pathing. The quests doesn't complete until the robot finds the goblin.
If Tabetha's quests were available don't backtrack here. Do Ony -> Elite crock -> Turn in Ogre quest -> Finish and turn in Tabetha's quest -> Turn these quests in -> HS to Theramore

If Tabetha's farm quest were available (who knows why they aren't...) this is where you would kill the spiders and test the totems on the crocks. Then you would turn these in after turning the ogre's final quest to then turn the zeppelin quests and HSing back to Theramore
Skip this step. -7k XP + mob XP if not available :(
Go to Ony's lair and plant the banner. Careful with the spell casters that spawn in the first wave. Super long range. The boss is a pushover.
Can pet tank. Pop CDs and trap if you need to bandage
HS back to Theramore (or turn in Tabetha's quests if available, then HS)
Upstairs
Go to the GY and use the flowers on the grave

subTasks.comment: Have to wait out the RP event there or it won't progress and the quest won't complete. Do first aids, drink some water, take a piss or something while you wait...

stepTasks.comment: >>> Refill quiver <<<
If you didn't have enough money for your mount before now it's a good time to go buy it
When done fly to Gadgetzan
While questing in Tanaris if you get the chicken beacon just hold it in your bags. It will be a while until we do that quest.
Now go to the port followin the road. New custom area with lots of quest.

subTasks.comment: If in your way there you find a human NPC running talk to him and buy any Elixir of waterbreathing he may have
Skip this step once you get there

stepTasks.comment: Inside the inn
>>> Set HS <<< In the new inn
Press the dialog option
Pick the dialog option
Choose the dialog option after acepting the quest
Choose the dialog option
Right as you step out of town turn right to the mountain range and kill the 4 scorpids for venom sacs, then the one on your way to the marker

subTasks.comment: Once you get here clear the 3 tents and the water extractor (?) off of BANDITS. You need to kill at least 6 bandits between the 3 tents and the well. Only need 3 thiefs
North tents -> water well -> south tents -> west tents

stepTasks.comment: Now here, to the ruins. Kill the scorpid on the way. Finish off bandits ,thiefs, water pouches and batteries
Back to the scorpids, they should have respawned. 10 kills for 6 drops. If you are missing some check the other 2 spawns you killed or go kill the 3 that can be found south of town

Go to the coast, drink your 3rd water breathing elixir (if you bought one use that one to free bag space) and then swim south while cleaning animals, cleaning oil spillages and recovering underwater parts.

subTasks.comment: Use the Cleaning Supplies to clean the animals. Some might attack you
Use the Oil Absorber to clean the spills
The filter parts are undewater, and are hard to see, so move your mouse around while killing sharks to see if the cursor changes

stepTasks.comment: Back to Gadgetzan. Choose the dialog option
Now go to the Mirage Raceway. No need to accept anything else from the gnomes
Don't accept the follow up 'Razzeric's Tweaking'. Could be worth it with 30min HS cooldown, definetly not otherwise.
Choose the dialog option to get the battery
HS back to Tanaris' port
Use the Oil Cannister at the base of the oil rig (right on the marker).
Get on the oil rig and use the explosives on the orange barrells
The Overseer is in the top floor
Go here and kill Hagesh
Go into the pirate area through the tunnel south of were you are. Go to where Andre is while killing other pirates for the TF2 quest (pirate hats)
While killing mobs here some might drop a footlocker. What you are looking for here is the Ship Shedule, an item that starts a quest. You can delte anything else (including the maps).

subTasks.comment: It's a 1.5% drop chance roughly between the footlocker drop rate (10%) and the contents of it (15% for the schedule), so don't bother grinding for it, it's just some extra.

stepTasks.comment: Go to the second floor here to recover the shipment. 3 pirates pull on the second room, use the explosives you just got from the oil rig quest.
Now go outside and finish the hats + the other pirates you might be missing.
If you didn't get the Ship Schedules just skip this step
While running around keep an eye out for Raging tempests (air elementals). Use the item while they are low HP (30%) to absorb them for a quest
Back to the Wastewanderers (kill rogues, assassins and lock on the way area. You will se Scorpidsting running around at some point. He is guarded by 2 stealthed rogues.

subTasks.comment: Hit like trucks as per usual. Elemental damage (true damage practically) is very balanced with the mobs increased damage custom change!!!

stepTasks.comment: Check how many water pouches you have. Try to leave the area with an amount equal to a multiple of 5 (390 XP for every 5 puches).
Skip this step
Kill Basilisks and collect Raging tempests while making your way to the skeletons with the Fire Rocs at [46,39]

subTasks.comment: Use the charger on the Raging Tempests when low HP

stepTasks.comment: Just do laps around the bones killing vultures. It will take a while, drop rate is low (edited: seems drop rate has been increased as per the bug tracker)
Leave your pet behind. Use the pipe to complete the quest. 2 mobs will spawn, just disengage + FD
Gnomes will attack you when you collect the quest items

subTasks.comment: 7 nodes, 6 items required. Super party friendly quest... Too bad if you want to level with friends

stepTasks.comment: HS back to Tanari's port
Go to the gnome's north of town to mix the ingredients
Pull the lever (Kronk!) that's besides Goddard then turn the quest in
>>> Refill quiver <<<

subTasks.comment: Skip this step if you didn't get the item while doing pirates's quests

stepTasks.comment: Back to Gadgetzan. Check if water guy still has some elixirs while on the road
Turn in as many water pouches as you can for some XP + a chance at potions
Don't accept the follow up yet
Fly to Feralas' border with 1k needels
Just like in Tanaris, if you come across the chicken beacon just hold onto it untill you have to accept the quest.
Follow the nelf and make your way to the cage then release the darters
After releasing them just help the ones that are fighting any grimtotems. Once the quest updates go back to where you were.
You wil have to go to this camp to finish off Naturalists as tehre are not enough in the first one where the cage is
On your way to the ogre camp kill the screechers and use the Bramble to release the spirits. Talk to them and pick the dialog option to progress the quest.

subTasks.comment: If you don't find 3 before reaching camp just skip this step and finish the quest when you jump down to the coast

stepTasks.comment: From the WANTED post left as you enter the camp
Go to the shore. Don't accept the mirror's quest in the ogre camp or the quests from the goblin in the beach.
Finish screechers if needed be
Now go to Feathermoon. If the ship was arriving when you set foot in the docs take it then jump down off of it at the sout-eastern side of the island and mount up. Otherwise, just swim.
>>> Set HS <<< Buy 2 stacks of level 45 water
Learn the FP
Ride here and click the structure
